title: The duty of self-denial briefly opened and urged. By Thomas Watson, minister of the Gospel
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and three Crowns in Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel; and at the Bible on London-Bridg,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
